> Is there any way by which i
> can some more information about the test like input values, expected
> result, description of test case.


I'm not a junitreport user and just looked briefly at the code, so take 
what I say with caution.  Briefly said, I think there's a hope :-)

you have to write a class that implements the JUnitResultFormatter 
interface and pass if via the formatter option of junitreport.  Be 
prepare for a lot of casting and if instance of...

HTH

-Vladimir
